messages.message:
@Shubh Samtani Can you share the job link / PR number with me?
I'm very curious as to why the jobs are still pulling the old image tag :face_with_monocle:
@Cody Boggs Here's the link to the PR - https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/59107

Strange that it keeps pulling 1.1.1
```12:13:36  	--rm 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/ci-unit-tests:1.1.1 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/ci-unit-tests:1.1.1) make -C /instabase_dir/shared-utils/build-utils/shared gcr-auth clean build test-changes GITHUB_TOKEN=**** PR_NUMBER=instabase/PR-59107 CLEAN=true```
@shiqi is it common for so many PRs to keep using an old `master` commit like this?
or is it an issue of the PRs having the broken image tag in place and the merge is simply assuming the PR code is prime?
I am not sure, from the git log of that job it should get the head of master with the revert, maybe that value is cached somewhere
